channel.title: Freestyle - Pieter van Boven
channel.description:
This is my latest track (and my first topic)!
Link : https://soundcloud.com/ietervanoven/sets/pieter-van-boven-freestyle
I've been using Auxy for ages but somehow i never posted a topic on here. I'm also dropping a new album on 14-5-2018! Enjoy!

item.title: Freestyle - Pieter van Boven
item.dc:creator: PietervanBoven
item.description:
Thanks for the feeback! This track was created before Sweet Pads came out and even before the recent update. I wanted to keep the track minimal but now looking back on it i realize that maybe some different sounds here and there would’ve made it a bit better.

Read full topic

item.title: Freestyle - Pieter van Boven
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Love the beat! Really love it.

The use of Tonsil is too obvious, too ‘Auxy’, imo – and is disappointing as a result.
To me, it’s a shame the track is built around that sound – especially as there’s so little variation throughout that three minutes.

The subby bass and floaty synth that joins in works well though.

Definitely feels like it needs to break out and do something more.*

(Would strongly consider either reworking Tonsil to use it less ‘off-the-shelf’, or consider an alternative – possibly one of the new ‘vocal’ sounds from the Sweet Pads set, or maybe even an imported sample.)

 
* I think a good point of reference would be 212 by Azelia Banks. Still a very simple track based around a similar groove to you, but it kicks into another gear when the main hook drops in.

Read full topic
